Name: Evil Bankman
Text: HA! You brought students to defeat me?

Name: Evil Bankman
Text: You'll never have what it takes! We're too strong!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: We'll see about that! These are our finest students!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: They are Game Designers that will defeat Banktania once and for all!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: I'll be guiding you throughout the level to help you.

Name: LU Student
Text: Thank you! I'll do my best.

Name: Evil Bankman
Text: Uh oh, this is the game presentation and Professor Hewel is in charge.
